description:
Made from Repreve recycled polyester and a burly plastic buckle, it keeps your pants up wherever you're headed, whatever you're doing. Goes with your snow pants, jeans or fancy pants. Yes, it really is that versatile.

  • Low-profile buckle has been updated with a contour to match your curves
  • Plastic buckle is as easy to open and close as ever, still won't get in the way during activity, and doesn’t need to come off at the airport
  • Stretchy elastic webbing uses Repreve® recycled polyester
  • One-size design fits up to 40in. waists
  • Machine washable should things get funky
name: Arcade Atlas Belt - Unisex
